Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.35123179]Zika virus(ZIKV):inhibition the activity of Zika virus NS2B-NS3 protease(40% inhibition at 100 Î¼M).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide inhibits the NS2B-NS3 protease and thus inhibits virus replication.

Literature.Title: SAR evolution towards potent C-terminal carboxamide peptide inhibitors of Zika virus NS2B-NS3 protease.
Literature.Author: Colarusso S, Ferrigno F, Ponzi S, Pavone F, Conte I, Abate L, Beghetto E, Missineo A, Amaudrut J, Bresciani A, Paonessa G, Tomei L, Montalbetti C, Bianchi E, Toniatti C, Ontoria JM.
